programmes.show_description: Katie Breathwick has the perfect blend of night-time music to keep you company through the early hours.
Sam presents three hours of start-the-day music, along with plenty of information about what's in store on Classic FM this weekend.
Tim presents Classic FM Breakfast at the weekend, with three hours of brilliant classical music including the Hall of Fame Hour at 9am.
Tim brings you an hour of the biggest classical hits from the Classic FM Hall of Fame - the annual Top 300 chart voted for by you.
Aled invites you to join him for three hours of the best classical music, with an unmissable morning of old favourites and new discoveries.
Alexander presents the perfect classical music for a relaxing Saturday afternoon, including the Hall of Fame 3 at 3: three pieces of music from the Top 300, as voted by you.
Alan presents the best classical music for a Saturday afternoon with special features: Off The Box - a classic TV theme, the Titchmarsh Teaser, and a seasonal Gardening Tip.
Jonathan Ross, award-winning presenter and film critic, presents the greatest music from the silver screen.
YouTuber and gamer Daniel Middleton, known as DanTDM, showcases the best video game music, from original scores to classical pieces hidden in game soundtracks.
Myleene presents her selection of calming classical music to help you wind down at the end of the day.
Katie Breathwick has the perfect blend of night-time music to keep you company through the early hours.
Sam presents three hours of start-the-day music, along with plenty of information about what's in store on Classic FM this weekend.
Tim presents Classic FM Breakfast at the weekend, with three hours of brilliant classical music including the Hall of Fame Hour at 9am.
Tim brings you an hour of the biggest classical hits from the Classic FM Hall of Fame - the annual Top 300 chart voted for by you.
Aled invites you to join him for three hours of the best classical music, with an unmissable morning of old favourites and new discoveries.
John Brunning provides the perfect Sunday afternoon soundtrack, with the finest music from best-loved favourites to new discoveries.
Actor, comedian and presenter Stephen Mangan is the host of Sunday afternoons on Classic FM, sharing three hours of his favourite classical music including the weekly Game Changer.
Zeb Soanes eases you into the evening with a relaxing soundtrack of all-time favourites and contemporary classics.
Ritula Shah provides the perfect soothing soundtrack to help you wind down at the end of the day.
